snippet.title: MECC: Murphy's Minerals
snippet.description:
Video showing the game play in MECC's Murphy's Minerals game, one of my favorite games back in grade school.  I still have the disk and an Apple IIe, although I would much rather emulate the game (I need some help getting the disk image to a PC).

Game now posted at: http://www.virtualapple.org/meccmurphysminerals.html
